nodes.title: Test PR to see if CI works correct
Add Factom DID driver to universal resolver
Add entry for did:v1 and did:key drivers.
Use settings.xml in Dockerfiles for did-common-java
fix: updated kilt example and driver version
HTTPS Binding guide for Driver Development
Security assesments and  suggested solutions by Snyk are being updated.
CI/CD config for GitHub and GitLab
Added docu for dev-system, branching, releasing, CI/CD
docs: added local driver testing steps
Add element did driver: did-elem v1.0
Updated README.md with more DID examples
Updated Driver Development documentation for added clarity
Change docker-compose for swarm deployments / auto-restart, add a run.sh script for easy deployment
Update imports from txref-conversion-java dependency. Fixes #18
Fix minor typeos in README file
Use did:s instead of names. Update paths.
chore: bring back orb did driver
ci: change scm setting to https so access_token can be used
ci: drop NET_RAW capabilities for all containers
ci: use certificate for Vault connection and upgrade to latest vault-action version
docs (driverdev): Add suggestion to whitelist drivers on Dockerhub
Remove did-factom because of broken image
docs: Add short descriptions of drivers in README.
Add generator code for W3C DID test suite reports
Update some docs related to cicd and branching.
Dev system at dev.uniresolver.io is using https by now.
feat: Better support for resolving and dereferencing.
Remove seraph-id driver because of missing image
did-meta resolver url added to config.json and README.md updated
Fix did test suite testserver input
did-ebsi resolver url added to config and README.md updated
fix(deps): update driver for for did:ethr and did:web to 2.1.0
add resolver URL for ION DIDs targeting bitcoin testnet
remove driver-specific dependencies from BOM file
use xml file for the logger configuration and use better log layout
update did:trust with new sample dids
fix: use correct url for did:ontid
chore(deps): bump pyyaml from 5.3.1 to 5.4 in /ci/smoke-tests/app
fix(deps): update drivers, tests and examples for did:ethr and did:web
Trigger enterprise workflow on main branch only
chore(deps): bump aiohttp from 3.7.2 to 3.7.4 in /ci/smoke-tests/app
Rename master to main in github workflows
Request to add UNISOT DID driver to the Universal Resolver.
Adds support for resolving ION DIDs
chore(deps): bump junit from 4.13 to 4.13.1 in /resolver/java
Adding the new UR to the page.
Slack notification on deploy workflow failure
fix: update did-ethr and did-web drivers
fix: use https in frontend to call api endpoint
Use github secrets for btcr env-variables
trustbloc automatic generation of deployment file with config
Fix UI not able to resolve drivers
